temples.name: Paris France Temple
temples.address: 46 Boulevard Saint Antoine 78150 Le Chesnay France
temples.services: Clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, Patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The Paris France Temple was the twelfth temple to be built in Europe. It serves members from seven stakes in France. On August 1, 1976, President Spencer W. Kimball spoke to the French Saints at a member meeting held in Paris where he said: ‘if we clench our fists and grit our teeth, a temple will be available to the members here.’ This came to pass in May of 2017 when the Paris temple was dedicated.
temples.closures: Saturday, 2 April 2022 (Limited Operations); Monday, 13 June 2022 - Monday, 22 August 2022; Saturday, 1 October 2022 (Limited Operations); Saturday, 24 December 2022; Saturday, 31 December 2022

temples.name: Laie Hawaii Temple
temples.address: 55-600 Naniloa Loop Laie HI 96762-2202 United States
temples.services: Clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, No patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The Laie Hawaii Temple was the first to be dedicated outside of the continental United States and serves church members on the islands of Oahu, Kauai and Kiribati. It was dedicated in November of 1919, then again in June of 1978 after an extensive remodel, and once again in November of 2010 following structural and seismic upgrades. This temple has been a continuous blessing to the saints in Hawaii. It was dedicated sixteen years before the creation of the first Hawaiian stake in 1935.
temples.closures: Friday, 1 April 2022 (Limited Operations); Saturday, 2 April 2022; Friday, 30 September 2022 (Limited Operations); Saturday, 1 October 2022; Thursday, 24 November 2022; Friday, 23 December 2022 (Limited Operations); Saturday, 24 December 2022 - Monday, 26 December 2022

temples.name: San Diego California Temple
temples.address: 7474 Charmant Dr San Diego CA 92122-5000 United States
temples.services: Clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, No patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The San Diego California Temple was dedicated in April of 1993 and serves church members throughout Southern California and parts of Arizona. It proved to be a popular temple as over 720,000 visitors attended the widely publicized open house over six weeks. President Gordan B. Hinkley dedicated the San Diego temple in 23 sessions where almost 50,000 people attended. The Church was presented with the Silver Anvil Award for its efforts to increase public awareness of the temple through the temple open house.

temples.name: Buenos Aires Argentina Temple
temples.address: Aut. Tte. Gral. Riccheri N° 4955 B1778DUA Ciudad Evita Buenos Aires, Argentina,
temples.services: Clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, No patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The Buenos Aires Argentina Temple was the fourth temple built in South America and the first built in Argentina. It serves members from 49 stakes headquartered in Eastern and Southern Argentina. It was dedicated in January of 1986 and again in September of 2012 after an extensive expansion and remodeling project.

temples.name: Rome Italy Temple
temples.address: Via di Settebagni 376 Rome RM Italy
temples.services: Clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, Patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The Rome Italy Temple was the thirteenth temple to be built in Europe and the first built in italy. It serves church members in Italy as well as Malta, Greece, Cyprus, Albania and parts of Romania. The Rome temple was dedicated in March of 2019 and marked the first time in history when the entire first presidency and quorum of the twelve gathered to one location outside the United States. This beautiful temple has been a long awaited blessing for the saints in Italy and the surrounding areas.
